text:
"AIS identification complete, how may I help you, my friend?"
OR
"AIS identification complete, how have you been, Commander $personName? Nonetheless, its good to see you, my friend."
"Aren't we the enemy?" $personName asked curiously, "What were you expecting when you opened a comm link to an enemy?"
"Traverser, if you don't want to get into trouble, I suggest you'd better be careful."

"No point in talking, get your fleet ready for a fight."
OR
"Behind us is our home, and I will not budge!"
"Please turn on your transponder immediately, navigation with transponders off is not allowed in this sector."

text:
"Foreign traverser, what can I do for you?"
OR
"Identity confirmed, traverser, please confirm the purpose of your visit."
"If you are really prepared to hand over such a thing, we will be happy to take it, and we will, of course, be prepared to pay a price that will satisfy you."
"Thank you very much for your contribution, these cores will help us a lot!"
You are just a stranger and a hurried traverser to $theFaction and they will help you as much as they can, that's all.
$theFaction has endorsed your person, which means you have access to some goods from the $theFaction military market. .
Your name is already well known to most officers, $theFaction has opened up special market access to you and the fleets within the system are more than happy to help you in any way they can.ã€‚
As a friend $theFaction thinks highly of you and most officers will greet you or return a smile when they meet you.

$theFaction values your alliance, and patrol fleets within their systems will go out of their way to help you. Various exclusive certificates guarantee you access to certain places that are out of the reach of ordinary people, and it is said that the Director will personally meet with the person who has such a certificate.
Your actions have come to the attention of $theFaction and although their open markets will still allows you access, the hassle of the formalities and the frequent searches will be too much for you.
You have clearly felt the mistrust from $theFaction. All ports and markets are no longer accessible to you, and patrols within their systems will be checking your movements.
You have been completely blacklisted by $theFaction. Fleets under $theFaction will attack your fleet without mercy.
Your relationship with $theFaction has gone completely on ice. Your person and fleet have been highlighted on their bounty list, and it may not be long before a fleet comes after you.
